mapper.select: SELECT d.id, d.kb_id, d.parent_id, d.title, d.type, d.icon, d.sort, d.file_ext, d.file_size, d.update_time, d.status, -- 1. 关联查人名 u.real_name AS create_user_name, -- 2. 子查询查是否有子节点 (SELECT COUNT(1) > 0 FROM document sub WHERE sub.parent_id = d.id AND sub.deleted = 0) AS has_children FROM document d LEFT JOIN user u ON d.create_by = u.id WHERE d.deleted = 0 AND d.kb_id = #{kbId} AND d.parent_id = #{parentId} ORDER BY d.sort ASC, d.create_time DESC

SELECT * FROM document WHERE deleted = 1
AND file_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
ORDER BY update_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE document SET tree_path = REPLACE(tree_path, #{oldPathPrefix}, #{newPathPrefix}) WHERE kb_id = #{kbId} AND tree_path LIKE CONCAT(#{oldPathPrefix}, '%') AND deleted = 0
